<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="in-text"
      version="1.0"
      et-al-min="3"
      et-al-use-first="2">

    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <names variable="author">
        <name delimiter=", "/>
      </names>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
